glsa.title: RealPlayer: Buffer overflow
glsa.synopsis: RealPlayer is vulnerable to a buffer overflow allowing for the execution of arbitrary code.

background.p: RealPlayer is a multimedia player capable of handling multiple multimedia file formats.

description.p: Dyon Balding of Secunia Research reported an unspecified heap-based buffer overflow in the Shockwave Flash (SWF) frame handling.

impact.p: By enticing a user to open a specially crafted SWF (Shockwave Flash) file, a remote attacker could be able to execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the user running the application.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All RealPlayer users should upgrade to the latest version:
